original_text: Blessed be your discretion, and blessed be you, who have kept me this day from bloodguilt and from working salvation with my own hand!
korean_text: 또 네 지혜를 칭찬할지며 또 네게 복이 있을지로다 오늘 내가 피를 흘릴 것과 친히 복수하는 것을 네가 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: who have kept me this day
and from working salvation with my own hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 손으로 구원을 이루는 것에서도
